description: Retrieves a list of API destination in the account in the current Region.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token returned by a previous call, which you can use to retrieve the next set of results. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Using an expired pagination token results in an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinations
nested_items.description: An array that includes information about each API destination.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the API destination.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the API destination.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationState
nested_items.description: The state of the API destination.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the connection specified for the API destination.

nested_items.name: InvocationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL to the endpoint for the API destination.

nested_items.name: HttpMethod
nested_items.description: The method to use to connect to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: InvocationRateLimitPerSecond
nested_items.description: The maximum number of invocations per second to send to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the API destination was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the API destination was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating there are more results available. If there are no more results, no token is included in the response.
